column1: スパーダ・ベルフォルマ
column4:
Frank, honest person. A bit proper manner of speaking but knows some street slang. He’s a horndog that always gets bonked, he never learns his lessons but is the most honest friend you can have.

Refers to Hartman as Gramps, his dad as "my old man," Ricardo as "old man Ricardo," maybe "Little Sweetie Ruca" for Ruca sometimes too?

column1: Short History Pre-Cielo’s Destruction (might not be accurate)

Primordial Giant creates Cielo and leaves behind the Genesis  (Skit: The Giant’s Wish)
(Few centuries pass)
Vritra is born
Ratio uses the Genesis to exile a portion of Cielans to Terro (Skit: Why were you Protecting the Manifest?)
(another few centuries)
Sentiments against the way Ratio is ruling forms and a band of rebels start to appear
Asura is born
Orifiel is granted the task of raising and teaching Himmel (Himmel, Cielo’s Light)
Inanna’s mother die from Terron hands (Memory in the Sky Castle)
Skirmishes start to take place between Ratio and the rebels
Gaebolg is created (Memory in Kelm's Volcano)
Asura meets Cerberus and asks about the Genesis
Asura forms Sensus from the band of rebels
Orifiel goes to Cerberus to get the Genesis and fails (Orifiel and Cerberus)
Sakuya falls in love with Asura (Memory in the Sky Castle, first pink flower)
Durandal is created (Memory in Kelm's Volcano)
Inanna accepts a mission to assassinate Asura
Inanna defects to Sensus with Durandal
Thanatos falls in love with a Terron
Asura and Durandal meet Gaebolg on the battlefield (Memory circle in Kelm's Volcano)
Asura meets Orifiel
Orifiel starts corresponding with Sensus
Himmel is imprisoned for thoughts that stand against Ratio’s beliefs
Thanatos leaves Ratio
Hypnos is sent to the front lines in replacement of his brother
Himmel dies
Hypnos dies after facing Asura
Asura conquers the Sky Castle
Orifiel kills the Senate after learning of Himmel’s death and joins Sensus
The war continues as Ratio continues to fight Sensus
Inanna Sakuya pandering
Asura conquers Ratio and unites Cielo, eventually obtaining the Genesis and learning how it’s used from Cerberus
Asura asks Orifiel as to how it’s supposed to be used (Memory circle at Galpos)
Inanna contemplates, troubled with what she’s supposed to do
Asura, Durandal, and Inanna gets killed using the Genesis and halfway merging Cielo and Terro
Vritra waits alone in the Sky Castle
Vritra dies after hearing the birth of Asura’s Incarnation
Hermana Localized words and Equivalents (for reference)

column2: adv. Substitute for very, which can’t be used south of the Mason-Dixon line. Very is avoided in the South. See also mighty.
n. Pert much anything worn over the legs: pants, dungarees—trousers? What’s that?
n. Nose stuffing; a rascal, as in "Come here, you little booger!"
n. Creature, with special preference for animals.
n. The meal et around the middle of the day.
v. Go, get, and bring back.
adj.Exhausted, tard, tuckered out, as coming home from plowing 40 acres plumb give out.
v. aux. Modal auxiliary indicating obligation. (Must is a word not found in most Southern dialects).
v. Talk at the top of your voice
int. Short for ’howdy do’, a common greeting down South.
n. Larnin whut gives you a edge in life. "He got lots of smarts but not much edgy-cation."
v. aux. Modal auxiliary indicating obligation. (Must is a word not found in most Southern dialects).
v. Think, figger. "I reckon he done got too big fer his britches, thinkin he’s a lawyer."
n. The meal (supposed to be) et around 5 o’clock
An acceptable substitute in the presence of ladies for "damnation."
v. Whup, tear up, beat real good as in
adv. (over here, over there, over yonder)
